Object.Field:
Author: Sunopsis Version: 4.2 Last Update: SEP 2006
SAS particularites: REMOTE_LIB : Set this option to YES if the library you're accessing is not Local to to Agent. SAS COMMAND : SAS COMMAND to launch the SAS interpreter. SAS FILE : File used to store the SAS scripts

import java.sql as sql import java.lang as lang import time import string class Log: """Creates a log file and traces information """ def __init__(self, logfilename, uselog=1, append=0, printtoscreen=0): self.logfilename = logfilename self.printtoscreen = printtoscreen self.uselog=uselog if self.uselog: if not append: # Reset the file f = open(logfilename, "w") f.close()
def record(self, rec): if self.uselog: t = time.localtime() l = '%d-%02d-%02d %02d:%02d:%02d - %s' % (t[0], t[1], t[2], t[3], t[4], t[5], rec) f = open(self.logfilename, "a+") print >> f, l f.close() if self.printtoscreen: print l
logFilename='<%=snpRef.getOption("LOG_FILENAME")%>' useLog= <%=snpRef.getOption("Use Log")%> logger = Log(logfilename=logFilename, uselog=useLog, printtoscreen=1)

CREATE TABLE SAS_REV_TABLE (SAS_SCHEMA <%=snpRef.getDataType( "DEST_VARCHAR","30" )%>, SAS_TABLE <%=snpRef.getDataType( "DEST_VARCHAR","30" )%>, SAS_TAB_ALIAS <%=snpRef.getDataType( "DEST_VARCHAR","30" )%>, SAS_TYPE <%=snpRef.getDataType( "DEST_VARCHAR","30" )%>, SAS_COL <%=snpRef.getDataType( "DEST_VARCHAR","30" )%>, SAS_DT <%=snpRef.getDataType( "DEST_VARCHAR","30" )%>, SAS_LEN <%=snpRef.getDataType( "DEST_NUMERIC","30" )%>, SAS_PREC <%=snpRef.getDataType( "DEST_NUMERIC","30" )%>, SAS_POS <%=snpRef.getDataType( "DEST_NUMERIC","30" )%>, SAS_DESC <%=snpRef.getDataType( "DEST_VARCHAR","50" )%>, SAS_HEAD <%=snpRef.getDataType( "DEST_VARCHAR","25" )%>, SAS_FORMAT <%=snpRef.getDataType( "DEST_VARCHAR","30" )%>, SAS_MAND <%=snpRef.getDataType( "DEST_VARCHAR","1" )%>)

import java.sql as sql import java.lang as lang
driver, url, user, passwd = ( '<%=snpRef.getInfo( "DEST_JAVA_DRIVER" )%>', '<%=snpRef.getInfo( "DEST_JAVA_URL" )%>', '<%=snpRef.getInfo( "DEST_USER_NAME" )%>', '<%=snpRef.getInfo( "DEST_PASS" )%>')
##### Register Driver lang.Class.forName(driver) ##### Create a Connection Object myCon = sql.DriverManager.getConnection(url, user, passwd)
# Create SQL statement sqlcmd = "insert into SAS_REV_TABLE(SAS_SCHEMA,SAS_TABLE, SAS_TAB_ALIAS,SAS_TYPE, SAS_COL, SAS_DT, SAS_LEN, SAS_PREC,SAS_POS, SAS_DESC, SAS_HEAD,SAS_FORMAT,SAS_MAND) values ( ?,?,?,?, ?,?, ?,?,? ,?,?,?,? )"
prepStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(sqlcmd)
# Open source file fsrc = open('<%=snpRef.getOption( "Reverse File" )%>', 'r')
try: # for each line of the source file for lsrc in fsrc.readlines(): # get the list of values separated by '\t' valuelist = lsrc.split('\t') logger.record('val0: '+valuelist[0].rstrip().lstrip()+'\t val1: '+valuelist[1].rstrip().lstrip()+'\t val2: '+valuelist[2].rstrip().lstrip()+'\t val3: '+valuelist[3].rstrip().lstrip()+'\t val4: '+valuelist[4].rstrip().lstrip()+'\t val5: '+valuelist[5].rstrip().lstrip()+'\t val6: '+valuelist[6].rstrip().lstrip()+'\t val7: '+valuelist[7].rstrip().lstrip()+'\t val8: '+valuelist[8].rstrip().lstrip()+'\t val9: '+valuelist[9].rstrip().lstrip()+'\t val10: '+valuelist[10].rstrip().lstrip()) prepStmt.setString(1, valuelist[0].rstrip()) prepStmt.setString(2, valuelist[1].rstrip().upper()) if ("<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>")=="": prepStmt.setString(3, valuelist[1].rstrip().upper()[0:3]) else: prepStmt.setString(3, valuelist[1].rstrip().upper().replace("<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>","")[0:3]) prepStmt.setString(4, valuelist[2].rstrip()) prepStmt.setString(5, valuelist[3].rstrip().upper()) prepStmt.setString(6, valuelist[4].rstrip()) prepStmt.setDouble(7, int(valuelist[5].rstrip())) prepStmt.setDouble(8, int(valuelist[6].rstrip())) prepStmt.setDouble(9, int(valuelist[7].rstrip())) if (valuelist[8][1:50].rstrip().lstrip())=="": prepStmt.setString(10, valuelist[3][0:50].rstrip().upper()) else: prepStmt.setString(10, valuelist[8][0:50].rstrip()) if (valuelist[8][1:50].rstrip().lstrip())=="": prepStmt.setString(11, valuelist[3][0:25].rstrip().upper()) else: prepStmt.setString(11, valuelist[8][0:50].rstrip()) prepStmt.setString(12, valuelist[9]) if (valuelist[10].rstrip())=='no': prepStmt.setString(13, '0') else: prepStmt.setString(14, '1') prepStmt.executeUpdate()
finally: prepStmt.close() fsrc.close()

insert into SNP_REV_TABLE ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, RES_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_TYPE, TABLE_DESC, IND_SHOW, R_COUNT ) SELECT DISTINCT <%=snpRef.getModel("ID")%>, SAS_TABLE, SAS_TABLE, SAS_TAB_ALIAS, 'T', SAS_TABLE, '1','1' FROM SAS_REV_TABLE WHERE SAS_TYPE='DATA'

insert into SNP_REV_TABLE ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, RES_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_TYPE, TABLE_DESC, IND_SHOW, R_COUNT ) SELECT DISTINCT <%=snpRef.getModel("ID")%>, SAS_TABLE, SAS_TABLE, SUBSTR(SAS_TABLE,1,3), 'V', SAS_TABLE, 1,1 FROM SAS_REV_TABLE WHERE SAS_TYPE='VIEW'

insert into SNP_REV_COL ( I_MOD, TABLE_NAME, COL_NAME, DT_DRIVER, COL_DESC, COL_HEADING, POS, LONGC, SCALEC, COL_MANDATORY, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW, COL_FORMAT ) SELECT DISTINCT <%=snpRef.getModel("ID")%>, SAS_TABLE, SAS_COL, UPPER(SAS_DT), SAS_DESC, SAS_HEAD, SAS_POS, SAS_LEN, SAS_PREC, SAS_MAND, '1','1', SAS_FORMAT FROM SAS_REV_TABLE
